frame.name: Firing
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Employer</fen> ends an employment relationship with an <fen>Employee</fen>. There is often a <fen>Reason</fen> given for the action.
<ex><fex name="Employer">He</fex> <t>fired</t> <fex name="Employee">me</fex> <fex name="Position">as annotator</fex> <fex name="Explanation">for being too slow</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Employee
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person who is let go by their <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Empee">I</fex> was just <t>fired</t> yesterday!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Employer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person (or institution) that end an employment relationship with an <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>Dominic Mallozzi claims <fex name="Emper">United Trust Bank</fex> <t>fired</t> him from a job at the bank's Palmer Township branch because he's HIV positive.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which an <fen>Employer</fen> fires an <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>Five were <fex name="Mnr">hastily</fex> <t>fired</t>, and the federal government is investigating possible insider trading violations.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Employer</fen> fires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>The phone in his small apartment in the town of Milan rang and he dreaded it. He was going to be <t>fired</t> <fex name="Place">right there</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Position
FE.definition:
<def-root>The label given to a particular type of employment.
<ex>Doc Rivers was <t>fired</t> <fex name="Posit">as coach of the Orlando Magic</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which an <fen>Employer</fen> fires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>John <t>fired</t> her <fex name="Purpose">to make his the other employees nervous</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Task
FE.definition:
<def-root>The action that the <fen>Employee</fen> is relieved from doing for the <fen>Employer</fen>
.<ex>I was <t>fired</t> <fex name="Task">from training the new actors</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when an <fen>Employer</fen> fires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>Guess who just got <t>fired</t> <fex name="Time">today</fex>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the <fen>Employee</fen> is terminated.
<ex>North was <t>dismissed</t> <fex name="Explanation">for gross mismanagement of funds</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>The means whereby the <fen>Employer</fen> fires the <fen>Employee</fen>
<ex><fex name="Employer">Pat</fex> fired <fex name="Employee">Jan</fex> <fex name="Means">by leaving a letter of dismissal on his desk.</fex></ex></def-root>
